blur_detection.description: The receipt shows clear, well-defined text with minimal blur throughout.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed regarding image focus or sharpness.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt displays excellent contrast between black text and light background.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: Current contrast level is ideal for OCR processing.

glare_identification.description: There is minimal to no glare affecting the receipt visibility.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed regarding glare or reflections.

water_stains.description: No water stains or liquid damage visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No remediation needed for water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt appears flat with no significant creases or folds affecting readability.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed regarding physical damage.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the receipt are visible with no content appearing to be cut off.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Current framing is sufficient for complete data extraction.

missing_sections.description: The receipt contains all expected sections including header, item details, totals, and footer information.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions appear to be covering any part of the receipt.
obstructions.recommendation: Current image is free from obstructions and suitable for processing.
